item.title: Efficient Adaptation of Pre-trained Vision Transformer via Householder Transformation
item.description: Boosting Vision Transformer adaptation! Householder Transformation-based Adaptor (HTA) outperforms existing methods by dynamically adjusting adaptation matrix ranks across layers, improving efficiency…
